channel.title: AD integration: how to specify an allowed AD group
channel.description:
### Issue Summary
I'm trying to set up AD integration with Redash 8.0.2. I have it working, except I can't figure out how to restrict logins to an AD group. Has anyone gotten that to work? Tested with Firefox and Chrome
Note that I can get logins to work when using CN=Users..., just not CN=group,CN=users...
### Technical details:
* Redash Version:8.0.2 * Browser/OS: Firefox/Chrome Windows 10 * How did you install Redash: Self-built (by a developer in-house)

item.title: AD integration: how to specify an allowed AD group
item.dc:creator: dgold9670
item.description:
Issue Summary

I’m trying to set up AD integration with Redash 8.0.2. I have it working, except I can’t figure out how to restrict logins to an AD group.
Has anyone gotten that to work?
Tested with Firefox and Chrome

Note that I can get logins to work when using CN=Users…, just not CN=group,CN=users…

Technical details:

  • Redash Version:8.0.2
  • Browser/OS: Firefox/Chrome Windows 10
  • How did you install Redash: Self-built (by a developer in-house)
